name: cs5678_2024sp.h_balloon_selection.hinkle.gdh55
description: The Balloon Selection package is a package created for use within the XRC Framework. This interaction technique allows users to use hand tracking to create a balloon selection technique to interact with objects in a 3D environment. This package includes a sample scene, input action map, prefabs, and audio samples to showcase the Balloon Selection technique in a Unity scene.

samples.description: The includes a sample showcasing the XRC Balloon Selection implementation in a Unity scene.

samples.displayName: XRC Balloon Selection Input Action Map
samples.description: XRC Balloon Selection Input Action Map is a sample input action map that can be used to interact with the Balloon Selection package.
The Balloon Selection are a collection of prefabs that can be used to interact with the Balloon Selection technique.
The Balloon Selection contains the audio sample used in the Balloon Selection package
